template.description: Get stock on hand lineitems, put them into kafka, and then pull them from kafka and into a Postgres table
template.name: Get lineitems

labels.label: Run once to create the stock on hand line items table from the schema. (Can also be used to create any other table given a different schema)
Get data from api, to kafka and then to postgres table
Consume data already in kafka from here instead of pulling from the API

entry.value: INSERT INTO sohlineitems (stockcardID, facilityID, facilityCode, facilityName, facilityActive, facilityEnabled, facilityType, programID, programCode, programName, orderableID, productCode, fullProductName, netContent, lastUpdate, quantity, reasonName, reasonType, reasonCategory, reasonID, occurredDate, stockOnHand, sohlineitems_id, source, destination) VALUES ('${stockcardID}', '${facilityID}', '${facilityCode}', '${facilityName}', '${facilityActive}', '${facilityEnabled}', '${facilityType}', '${programID}', '${programCode}', '${programName}', '${orderableID}', '${productCode}', '${fullProductName}', ${netContent}, '${lastUpdated}', ${quantity}, '${reasonName}', '${reasonType}', '${reasonCategory}', '${reasonID}', '${occuredDate}', ${stockOnHand}, '${lineItemID}', '${source}', '${destination}');
